p: Although, pharmacological activities of certain types of the Plumbaginaceae were investigated (Kuo et al., 2002 ▶; Chaung et al., 2003 ▶; Eren, 2016 ▶), considerable research was not done on biological activities and medical use of Acantholimon as a large genus. The present work is the first study dealing with cytotoxicity, antioxidant and antimicrobial potential of methanol extract of A. austro-iranicum, A. serotinum and A. chlorostegium as endemic plants distributed in the south-east of Iran.
